name: The Legend Of YuB
description: The great youtuber YuB (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNpcQ002WElJqT9r--R-Xfg) has faced a great predicament! All of the YuBscribers have disappeared from an unknown danger.  It's up to you, YuB to save them by going through the most frustrating levels that were ever created.
